entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
